List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void AddDataPoint (f32 fDataPoint)
 Add a new data point to this CPU chart. Recent data points are cached. During the next screen update, the contents of the window will now show this new data point plus all cached data points.

Protected Member Functions

Detailed Description

CPU chart. Show chart of CPU loads.

Member Function Documentation

void OGREGraphicsObjectCPUChart::AddDataPoint ( f32  fDataPoint  )  [virtual]

Add a new data point to this CPU chart. Recent data points are cached. During the next screen update, the contents of the window will now show this new data point plus all cached data points.

Parameters:
fDataPoint f32 - Data point to add to the chart.

Reimplemented from OGREGraphicsObjectChart.

Called by the framework every frame, so this window can update itself.

Parameters:
